statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -6 \\ 8 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ 4 \\ -8 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 0 \\ -14 \\ 16 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
